1588505836_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUt.body:
Anarcho-Communism is impossible. Once people learn to trade again it will become Anarcho-Capitalism. The way I see it is that technological progress will render the formation of a state impossible, but that will not happen for a long time.
The four technologies needed for this to happen are as follows:
1. Quantum Entanglement Teleportation - Tariffs will become impossible
2. A completely uncensored and self archiving internet protocol - Censorship will become impossible.
3. A completely private cryptocurrency with real world value - Taxation will become impossible
4. Widely available faster than light travel - Expansion into the stars will be impossible to regulate

1592403341_12MBVCw8iNrKvgTrV5NMPtPf6Z5V2.body: I could see a web game similar to nationstates.net being constructed in Zeronet.
